page.title: 11PENZANCE CATTLE MARKET.
page.content: We all went to Penzance Cattle Market with our teacher.There were lots of lorries.The auctioneer was speaking so fast we did not understand him. A man was unloading the cows.They were mooing.We saw some sheep being weighed on the big scales.Then they put them in a pen. Their fur was deep and greasy.They sniffed our hands.We saw some{Hereford cows with white faces and horns,and some{Friesian}cows.They were black and white. They had big udders full of milk. We loved the calves.The man put some glue on their backs and stuck a number on.They had lots of straw to lie on. We enjoyed our visit.Soon the market will be moved to a place outside the town.
